We are an NFT project that will be implemented to raise awareness about cruelty to animals.

We focus on a single animal species in our project to fully realize the pain experienced by elephants and raise questions about what other animal species may experience.

We want to make our voices heard worldwide with digital platforms. To do this, we use the high potential and power of NFT in our project.
